'''1.12.2-pre2'''<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-java-edition-1122-pre-release|Minecraft Pre-release 1.12.2-pre2|September 13, 2017}}</ref> is the second and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.12.2]], which fixed some bugs. This is the final pre-release released in 2017.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.12.2 Pre-Release 2|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|104259|Player / mob stuck on farmland while it changes to dirt
|118976|Landing on farmland gets the player stuck in flight mode
|120611|Player stuck in grass path when it changes to dirt
|;previous
|120645|Portals kick players for "Timed out" upon use in multiplayer
}}</onlyinclude>

== Videos == 
{{slicedlime|A_cg3lapjas}}

== Trivia ==
* 1.12.2-pre2 was previously removed from the [[Java Edition launcher|launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
* 1.12.2-pre2 has the same [[protocol version]] as [[Java Edition 1.12.2-pre1|1.12.2-pre1]], which means these versions are cross-compatible with each other.
